name: MusicalChairs
0:
”Alexa open musical chairs.”
”Alexa launch musical chairs.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: musical chairs
des:
Have fun playing Musical Chairs with Alexa!

Before you start the skill, you should have a set of chairs arranged with one fewer chair than the number of players. The players should all be standing around the chairs and ready to play.

When you open the skill, Alexa will ask you for the number of players. After you provide the number and confirm, the game will begin!

Alexa will play some music. When the music starts, the players should move around the chairs in a circle. When the music stops, the players should try to sit down. Anyone who doesn't get a seat is out! The game continues until there is only one player left who is declared the winner!

It is the same game of musical chairs that everyone knows and loves, except Alexa is running the show!

Once you are ready to play, just say, "Alexa, open Musical Chairs!"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
